at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.util

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.util.Unit

  • public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class handles the units.

    The mapping-information is read from properties-file. Usage: String unitText1 = at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.util.Unit.asText( 42 ); String unitText2 = at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.util.Unit.asText( "1093.1.1" );

      The Filename including the mapping between unitKey and unitText

    • Method Detail

      • getUnits

        private static java.util.Properties getUnits()
        Gives the units. If the units are not loaded already, loading is performed.
        Returns:
        the Units within the properties

      • asText

        public static java.lang.String asText(int unit)
        Converts the unixKey to a human readable text. The file 'units.props' includes the mapping between unitKeys and texts.
        Parameters:
        unit - the unitKey
        Returns:
        the human readable unit

        public static java.lang.String asText(java.lang.String unit)
